    persistent={
        "cluster": {
            "remote": {
                "cluster_two": {
                    "transport.compress": False
                },
                "cluster_three": {
                    "transport.compress": True,
                    "transport.ping_schedule": "60s"
                }
            }
        }
    },
)
print(resp)
